subject: English
atomic_concept: We use our ears to hear.

nested_learning.example: I hear music with my ears.
nested_learning.application: Close your eyes and listen to a sound.

misconception_fit: We do not hear with our eyes.
Ears are not used to smell.
socratic_prompts: Which body part helps you hear?
Can you hear when your ears are covered?

difficulty_modes.medium: We use our ears to hear.
difficulty_modes.hard: Ears help us hear sounds around us.
difficulty_modes.master: Ears are sense organs used for hearing.
